//Problem code: MIRRORS
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t,n,m;
    char s[10000];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        while(n--)
        {

                scanf("%s",&s);
            for(int i=m-1;i>=0;i--)
                printf("%c",s[i]);
               printf("\n");
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
